description:
MimoSleepFunction: Table recording MIMO sleep function configurations for various cells.

dateTime: Timestamp of the record.
Area_Name: Geographic area of the cell.
CellId: Unique identifier for the cell site.
Id2: Duplicate of CellId.
Id3: Another identifier potentially related to the cell's hardware.
Id4: Ancillary identifier (mostly '1' in sample).
vsDataType: Data type identifier.
vsDataFormatVersion: Version of the data format.
MimoSleepFunction.sleepMode: Overall sleep mode status (ON/OFF).
MimoSleepFunction.sleepEndTime: Scheduled end time for sleep mode.
MimoSleepFunction.portMerging4TxOpMode: 4Tx port merging operational mode.
MimoSleepFunction.switchDownPrbThreshold: PRB threshold for switching down from sleep mode.
MimoSleepFunction.sleepStartTimeApplied: Actual start time of the sleep mode.
MimoSleepFunction.switchUpMonitorDurTimer: Monitoring duration timer for switching up.
MimoSleepFunction.portMergingEnabled: Port merging enable/disable status.
MimoSleepFunction.sleepPowerControl: Power control scheme during sleep mode.
MimoSleepFunction.portMergingOptionFor4TxTo2Tx: Specific port merging option when reducing from 4Tx to 2Tx.
MimoSleepFunction.switchUpRrcConnThreshold: RRC connection threshold for switching up from sleep mode.
MimoSleepFunction.switchDownRrcConnThreshold: RRC connection threshold for switching down to sleep mode.
MimoSleepFunction.sleepState: Current sleep state (ACTIVATED/DEACTIVATED).
MimoSleepFunction.switchDownMonitorDurTimer: Monitoring duration timer for switching down.
MimoSleepFunction.sleepStartTime: Scheduled start time for sleep mode.
MimoSleepFunction.switchUpPrbThreshold: PRB threshold for switching up from sleep mode.
MimoSleepFunction.mimoSleepFunctionId: Unique identifier for the MIMO sleep function configuration.
MimoSleepFunction.sleepEndTimeApplied: Actual end time of the sleep mode.
